name: Never Rain
description:
Description:

Never Rain is an atmospheric single-player horror game set in a medieval village. You are tasked with uncovering what happened to your brother and the other residents of the village. Discover journals to uncover the world's secrets, collect and burn idols to rid the village of evil and to survive the evil haunting you.

Objectives:

- Find crow totems and burn them at the ritual site

- Search for notes located around the map

- Avoid the evil nun by switching off your lamp when she's nearby
